mapper.select: SELECT ob.order_number AS orderNumber, ob.stadium_name AS stadiumName, ob.sub_stadium_name AS subStadiumName, c.categoryName, ob.person_kind AS personKind, ob.ticket_id AS ticketId, ob.ticket_name AS ticketName, (case ob.ticket_type when '0' then '散票/年卡' WHEN '1' THEN '场地预定' WHEN '2' THEN '散客预定' ELSE '其他' END) as ticketType, ob.order_time AS orderTime, ob.order_channel AS orderChannel, ( CASE ob.status WHEN '0' THEN '待支付' WHEN '1' THEN '待使用' WHEN '2' THEN '已使用' WHEN '3' THEN '支付失败' WHEN '5' THEN '失效订单' ELSE '其他' END ) AS status, ob.sell_price AS sellPrice, ob.cost_price AS costPrice, ob.user_id AS userId, ob.user_name AS userName, ob.user_tel AS userTel, (case ob.pay_type when '1' then '支付宝' WHEN '2' THEN '微信' ELSE '无' END) AS payType, ob.pay_acount AS payAcount, ob.pay_time AS payTime, ob.pay_price AS payPrice, m.merchant_name AS merchantName FROM order_base_info ob LEFT JOIN classify c ON c.cid = ob.classify LEFT JOIN merchant m ON m.id = ob.merchant_id WHERE ob.id = #{orderId}

SELECT oc.id, oc.order_code AS orderCode, oc.start_time AS startTime, oc.end_time AS endTime, ( CASE WHEN oc.remain_number = '-1' THEN '不限次数' WHEN oc.remain_number = '' THEN '不限次数' WHEN oc.remain_number IS NULL THEN '不限次数' ELSE oc.remain_number END ) AS remainNumber, ( CASE WHEN oc.everyday_number = '-1' THEN '不限次数' WHEN oc.everyday_number = '' THEN '不限次数' WHEN oc.everyday_number IS NULL THEN '不限次数' ELSE oc.everyday_number END ) AS everydayNumber, oc.cost_price AS costPrice, oc.sell_price AS sellPrice, ( CASE oc.take_status WHEN '1' THEN '已取票' ELSE '未取票' END ) AS takeStatus, ( CASE oc.check_status WHEN '1' THEN '已验票' ELSE '未验票' END ) AS checkStatus, oc.remarks FROM order_content_detail oc WHERE oc.order_base_id = #{orderId}

SELECT oc.id, ( CASE WHEN oc.take_status='1' THEN '已取票' ELSE '未取票' END ) AS takeStatus, oc.take_time AS takeTime, oc.take_type AS takeType, ( CASE WHEN oc.check_status='1' THEN '已验票' ELSE '未验票' END ) AS checkStatus, oc.check_time AS checkTime, e.equipment_name AS equipmentName FROM order_content_detail oc LEFT JOIN equipment e ON e.equipment_id = oc.check_type WHERE oc.id = #{orderContentId}

SELECT u.used_time AS usedTime, ( CASE WHEN u.remian_number = '-1' THEN '不限次数' WHEN u.remian_number = '' THEN '不限次数' WHEN u.remian_number IS NULL THEN '不限次数' ELSE u.remian_number END ) AS remianNumber, ( CASE WHEN u.everyday_remian_number = '-1' THEN '不限次数' WHEN u.everyday_remian_number = '' THEN '不限次数' WHEN u.everyday_remian_number IS NULL THEN '不限次数' ELSE u.everyday_remian_number END ) AS everydayRemianNumber, u.used_number AS usedNumber, ( CASE WHEN u.remarks = '' THEN '无' WHEN u.remarks IS NULL THEN '无' ELSE u.remarks END ) AS remarks FROM used_records u WHERE u.order_content_id = #{orderContentId}
SELECT COUNT(0) AS count, ob.ticket_type AS ticketType FROM order_content_detail oc LEFT JOIN order_base_info ob ON oc.order_base_id = ob.id WHERE oc.id = #{orderContentId}
